body: the fuck is this comment section
Wtf is that last comment, "I only love hentai if I enjoy it", would someone love hentai if they didn't enjoy it? lol
i only love hentai if i enjoy it. I dont have any discrimination on taste. Just wanna jerk off thats alk

I love how the first part of this comment section was actually quite reasonable with people being respectful of each others opinions...then the last two comments were pure 4chan-levels of shite.

FYI, I take my doujin both ways, sometimes I like the cuteness of two lovebirds 'cumming' together, sometimes I like to self-insert. Really depends on my mood. :D

Anyone trying to say they prefer seeing an MC do it, is a fucking retard trying to lie to themselves. You don't fucking look at hentai for a story. You don't look at it and jerk off to see other people fucking girls you like. You watch it for sexual gratification. You do NOT have the ability to feel sexually gratified for other people. It just doesn't work like that for most people, weeaboo or not.

You'd have a retarded diseased mental disorder if you think sexual personal gratification comes from seeing other people fucking girls you like. So no, self inserts like this, are NOT cuckolding fetishes that make you a cuck. When you look at hentai hoping it's an MC, you're the cuck. Or you self insert as the MC, but then you'd be a guy who may as well be a fag if you're self inserting because you want to be this fucking person so much that you can have him fuck ANY girl, but any guy other than the MC, and suddenly it's shit.

So no, the idea that it has to be the MC is a mental disorder.
Like with lillie if she fucking some hairy fat dude I will not read it thats why I enjoy lillie and sun, moon, or just regular dude like this
With me most girls im fine with some random nigga fuckin them but their are some girls who are special to me who I don't want to see raped or gangbanged
...As I said, to each their own, friends. Individuality is what makes the world an interesting, if not wholly pleasant, place to live in. :)
Yeah I can see your point. My tastes would be the former, but I don't find stuff like this distasteful.

Both sides have merit, as long as it's not a horrendously ugly, horribly obese, or decrepit old guy. With the main character, it's someone you know and understand and can make for interesting stories. With a random (normal) man, it's easy to self-insert yourself into his position and imagine it's you that's having sex with the girls (or just watch them having sex with a stranger, which is erotic in its own way).
I guess I forgot to say "REGARDLESS I LIKED THIS AND SUCCESSFULY CAME." Happy now??? Though as a final note I'll just add that I draw the line at dilfs. Then it just gets wierd.
...To each their own, friends. jazzboy pretty much summed up my feelings on the matter, though. Makes my life that much easier. :p

Thats why all konosuba doujins suck.
It's always the same faggy mc.

"Because fuck it who needs chemistry when you have hentai logic???"

People (including me) prefer the second because it's more erotic and sexy to see these cute and innocent girls having lewd and hot sex with an actual grown man with experience than a boring sex with a little virgin boy like Ash, what's the fun to see Ash having sex? it's nothing erotic lmaoo also this is hentai, you don't need to see a girl from X series having sex with the mc, this is the magic of doujins, the possibilities are endless.

It's either Ash or some random ass considerably older male who has literally no direct involvement with anyone. People apparently like the latter. Because fuck it who needs chemistry when you have hentai logic???
